title: Pixel Imprint Option Not Available In Newly Bought Pixel 4A, not able to use fingerprint scanner.
content:
I got my Pixel 4A delivered on 18th Oct and within an hour I identified *Pixel Imprint* is missing. The option doesn't even exist. Multiple restarts, Safe Mode & Factory reset also didn't help resolve the issue.

Please advise what could be the problem, a case is raised with H/W specialist team as per Support Center.
